duties_responsibilities.duty: Source and secure Industrial and Industrial Outdoor Storage (IOS) assets within target markets.
Build networks with owners and brokers to source off-market opportunities.
Develop relationships with industrial users, particularly in the logistics sector.
Assist in end-to-end deal execution, including screening, underwriting, negotiation, and asset management.
Prepare investment committee presentation packages and maintain asset management models.
Collaborate with lenders and brokers on financing, refinancing, and dispositions.

education_certification.credential: BS/BA degree in business administration with a focus on Finance or Real Estate. Minimum 2 years of experience in industrial real estate, with a preference for experience in IOS sector.
